name: Down Below (Tiny Orb Interactive)
description:
THE GAME

Down Below is a 2.5D arcade game where the player is always falling down in order to reach the treasure on the ocean's floor. Armed with their trusty harpoon, the player must use it to fend off enemies and launch themselves towards where they want to go, while always moving down. 

This project was made in 48 hours as part of the AGD Slam Jam.
